name: angvald
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cim, cfv(clog, co(c2, cdiv, c0)))))
-| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), cfv(cim, cfv(clog, co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s0))))))

stmt.origin: syl22anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cim, cfv(clog, co(c2, cdiv, c0)))), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cim, cfv(clog, co(c2, cdiv, c0)))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c2, nat0))
-| wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cim, cfv(clog, co(c2, cdiv, c0)))))

-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c2, nat0))
-| wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cim, cfv(clog, co(c2, cdiv, c0)))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cim, cfv(clog, co(c2, cdiv, c0)))))
-| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), cfv(cim, cfv(clog, co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s0))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cim, cfv(clog, co(c2, cdiv, c0)))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c2, nat0))
-| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), cfv(cim, cfv(clog, co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s0))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

comment: The (signed) angle between two vectors is the argument of their quotient. Deduction form of ~ angval . (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
